statements: SELECT * FROM subscriber_billing;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscription_type, billing_date FROM subscriber_billing ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT subscription_type FROM subscriber_billing;
SELECT subscriber_id, payment_amount FROM subscriber_billing WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_billing WHERE payment_amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_billing WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY billing_date DESC
SELECT subscription_type, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM subscriber_billing GROUP BY subscription_type
SELECT subscriber_id, subscription_type, payment_amount FROM subscriber_billing WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC
SELECT * FROM subscriber_billing WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND subscription_type LIKE '%Gold%'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT subscriber_id) AS total_subscribers, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM subscriber_billing
SELECT * FROM 5g_subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM 5g_subscribers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, phone_number FROM 5g_subscribers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM 5g_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM 5g_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM 5g_subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM 5g_subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 3;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM 5g_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM 5g_subscribers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM 5g_subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, phone_number, subscription_plan FROM subscribers;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscribers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, email FROM subscribers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';

SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name, payment_status FROM subscribers JOIN billing_information ON subscribers.subscriber_id = billing_information.subscriber_id WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT billing_date, total_amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM billing_information JOIN payment_history ON billing_information.bill_id = payment_history.bill_id WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT subscription_plan, COUNT(subscriber_id) AS total_subscribers FROM subscribers GROUP BY subscription_plan HAVING COUNT(subscriber_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_billing;
SELECT subscriber_id, subscription_type, billing_amount FROM subscriber_billing ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM subscriber_profile WHERE subscriber_id = 123;
SELECT subscriber_id, payment_date, payment_method FROM payment_information WHERE amount_paid > 100;
SELECT subscriber_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscription_history WHERE subscription_status = TRUE ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_billing WHERE payment_status = TRUE
SELECT subscriber_id, subscription_type, billing_amount FROM subscriber_billing ORDER BY billing_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT subscriber_id, full_name, email_address FROM subscriber_profile WHERE subscriber_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT subscription_id, subscriber_id, start_date, subscription_status FROM subscription_history WHERE subscription_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM Subscriber;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Subscriber WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, subscription_date, expiry_date FROM Subscription WHERE subscriber_id = 2;
SELECT payment_method_id, method_type, card_number, expiry_date FROM PaymentMethod;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM PaymentHistory WHERE subscription_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Subscriber;
SELECT subscriber_id, name, email FROM Subscriber WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Subscriber ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT plan_name, subscription_date, expiry_date FROM Subscription WHERE subscription_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
